lagrangian_body_deformation_two_configur.description: Lagrangian approach diagram showing two deformed body configurations (ℰ⁰ and ℰ¹) connected by displacement vector u, with point P and position vectors illustrated

kinematics_initial_deformed_configuratio.description: Kinematics diagram showing initial configuration ℰ⁰ and deformed configuration ℰ¹ with point P, displacement vector u, and position vectors X̄ and x illustrated

eulerian_approach_time_instants.png.description: Eulerian approach diagram showing three body configurations at different time instants (t=t₁, t, t=t₂) with position vector X̄ and deformation stages

eulerian_deformed_body_configuration.png.description: Eulerian case diagram showing deformed body configuration with position vector x and spatial coordinate illustration

square_deformation_before_after.png.description: Deformation example showing square element before and after deformation with coordinate system and point A at position (1,1) transforming to (1+a, 1+a)

deformation_measure_two_points.png.description: Measure of deformation diagram showing two body configurations (ℰ⁰ and ℰ¹) with points P and Q, displacement vectors uₚ and uᵩ, and position vectors from origin O

rigid_rotation_differential_element.png.description: Small diagram showing rigid rotation with rotation tensor R and differential element dx along curved path

cauchy_continuum_volume_surface.png.description: Cauchy continuum diagram showing body with volume V and surface S, with small volume element ΔV and surface element ΔS extracted

force_moment_resultants_volume_surface.p.description: Force and moment resultants diagram showing volume element ΔV and surface element ΔS with force vectors ΔF and moment vectors ΔM

body_divided_internal_forces.png.description: Body divided into two parts showing virtual surfaces with stress vector t and normal vector n, illustrating internal force exchange between surfaces

cauchy_tetrahedron_stress_vectors.png.description: Cauchy tetrahedron diagrams showing triangular surface elements ΔS₁, ΔS₂, ΔS₃ with coordinate axes and stress vectors t₁, t₂, t₃, and normal vector n

first_piola_kirchhoff_reference_current..description: First Piola-Kirchhoff stress tensor diagram showing reference and current configurations with normal vectors N and n, infinitesimal areas dA and da, and force element dF

volume_change_transformation.png.description: Change of volume diagram showing transformation from reference configuration with infinitesimal vectors dX̄₁, dX̄₂, dX̄₃ to current configuration with dx₁, dx₂, dx₃ via transformation x = x(X̄)

nansons_formula_oriented_area.png.description: Nanson's formula diagram showing reference and current configurations with oriented area elements, normal vectors N in reference and n in current configuration
